text: employees often juggle various tools
spending more time searching for Content
than solving problems while many
software providers add generative AI
features these are often confined to
their own apps creating data silos that
Miss crucial context from other sources
the Amazon Q cross app index securely
unifies relevant content and context
from over 40 software applications and
data sources using this index software
vendors can create generative AI
features directly in their applications
or web pages that incorporate relevant
context from other
applications for example let's join a
zoom meeting with Leah Lindsay and Roco
as the call begins zoom's AI companion
assists by summarizing the meeting and
answering in-meeting
questions because this team chose to use
the AI companion with the Amazon Q cross
app index it not only summarizes the
meeting but automatically surfaces the
atlassian jira ticket and Google
Documents via references in the
conversation the cross app index
respects user level permissions across
connected apps ensuring documents
messages and data used in generated
responses are based on what users can
already access without leaving Zoom the
team quickly connects on the project
status finds relevant content and makes
an informed decision applications like
Asana Miro zoom and pager Duty are also
using the index from Amazon QBE business
to enhance their generative AI
experiences enhance your generative AI
features today with the Amazon Q cross
app index
